meta.name: Main repository index.
meta.description: This is the official repository index for Zolinga project

list.name: Zolinga DB
list.description: This is a database service providing MySQL database access API and support for installation .sql scripts.

list.name: Zolinga Cron
list.description: This is a cron service providing cron jobs support.

list.name: Zolinga RMS
list.description: This is a Rights Management System service providing user rights management support.

list.name: Zolinga Intl
list.description: This is an internationalization service providing translation support and more.

list.name: Zolinga CMS
list.description: This is a database-less content management system service.

list.name: Zolinga Commons
list.description: This is a common modules providing common utilities, widgets and support for other modules.

list.name: Zolinga AI
list.description: This is a common modules providing AI services.
